document.full_text: new york yankees starting pitcher phil hughes, who has lost the zip on his fastball in the early going this season, has been placed on the disabled list, the team said on friday.
document.title: "dead arm" puts yankees starter phil hughes on disabled list
lines_and_colors: new york yankees starting pitcher phil hughes, who has lost the zip on his fastball in the early going this season, has been placed on the disabled list, the team said on friday.
